title: France
summary: With a business presence in France since 1906, Citi France provides a full range of Corporate and Investment Bank financial services to CAC40 companies, French multi-nationals and their subsidiaries, as well as the French government.
tag-2: Citi provides for the day-to-day financing needs of French groups throughout the world.
